content: **2022 since i ve been retired from pattern making for a while now and this pattern is old i decided to make it free ** **note someone merged a different owl pattern listing with this one and i haven t been able to get a response on removing it the owl design in the projects from before 2012 is a different pattern and it s not included ** pattern includes photo tutorial for magic_ring and color changes template for the felt piece and some photos to help you along the way pdf has 12 pages you will need ♥ e/3 5mm hook ♥ worsted weight yarn in brown white and orange ♥ pair of 15mm safety eyes ♥ pink felt ♥ pink embroidery thread ♥ yarn needle ♥ embroidery needle ♥ stuffing this owl is about 4 10cm tall and 5 5 14cm wide results will vary depending on your gauge and your yarn & hook choice *thanks to my testers <3* **join the adorably kawaii 1 group to share fo s made from my patterns ask questions join in cals/kals and more ** 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/adorably-kawaii
